name.baseName: Electricity production ; Electricity ; Thermal power (76.1%) + hydropower (7.2%) + wind power (12.4%) + solar power (4.3%)

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Forms of electricity generation include thermal power, hydropower, wind power and solar power
电力产生形式包括火力发电、水力发电、风力发电和太阳能发电

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: Calculated based on data from the 2019 Energy Statistics Yearbook
根据2019年能源统计年鉴数据计算

technology.technologicalApplicability: This electricity production data set encompasses a mix of thermal (coal, gas, oil), hydropower, wind power, and solar power generation facilities. The proportion of each type of power generation is 76.1% for thermal power, 7.2% for hydropower, 12.4% for wind power, and 4.3% for solar power. It is intended for use in the energy sector for providing electricity to residential, commercial, industrial, and public services. This diverse energy mix is useful for understanding the environmental impact of electricity consumption within regions that utilize these varying electricity generation methods.
该电力生产数据集包括热电（煤炭、天然气、石油）、水电、风电和太阳能发电设施的组合。各种发电类型的比例为：火力发电76.1%，水力发电7.2%，风力发电12.4%，太阳能发电4.3%。这些数据主要用于能源领域，为住宅、商业、工业和公共服务提供电力。该多样化的能源组合有助于了解在使用这些不同发电方法的地区的电力消费的环境影响。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: For the accounting method, please refer to the "Enterprise Greenhouse Gas Emissions Accounting Methods and Reporting Guidelines for Power Generation Facilities". Different forms of power generation and fuel consumption come from Chapter 3 (Energy Production) and Chapter 6 (Regional Energy Balance Sheet) in the "China Energy Statistical Yearbook 2020". The fuel parameters such as low calorific value and carbon content per unit calorific value used to calculate the carbon dioxide emission factor come from the "2019 China Regional Power Grid Carbon Dioxide Baseline Emission Factor Calculation Instructions OM" and the "Enterprise Greenhouse Gas Emission Accounting Method and Reporting Guide for Power Generation Facilities" 》
核算方法参考《企业温室气体排放核算方法与报告指南 发电设施》。不同形式发电量及燃料用量来自于《中国能源统计年鉴 2020》中的第三章（能源生产） 和第六章（地区能源平衡表）。用于计算二氧化碳排放因子的低位发热量、单位热值含碳量等燃料参数来自于《2019 年度中国区域电网二氧化碳基准线排放因子 OM 计算说明》、《企业温室气体排放核算方法与报告指南 发电设施》

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 熊若熙. 中国电力生产和消费二氧化碳与污染物排放因子核算. (清华大学, 2023).
熊若熙. 中国电力生产和消费二氧化碳与污染物排放因子核算. (清华大学, 2023).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), it is important to accurately reflect the regional energy mix as indicated. The emissions factors should be applied based on this proportional representation of electricity generation sources. Methodological attention must be given to the scope of the LCA, ensuring that the electricity consumption in the analyzed system adheres to this power generation distribution. Any updates or changes in the energy mix or technology should be considered and the data should be adjusted accordingly. The data should not be used for single-source energy generation assessments unless the specific source matches one of the profile's proportions. Users are advised to consult the referenced 'Enterprise Greenhouse Gas Emissions Accounting Methods and Reporting Guidelines for Power Generation Facilities' for calculating greenhouse gas emissions.

在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）时，重要的是要准确反映所示的区域能源组合。应基于这种电力生成来源的比例代表来应用排放因子。在确定LCA范围时，必须进行方法论注意，确保分析系统中的电力消费符合这种电力生成分布。任何能源组合或技术的更新或变化都应考虑，并相应调整数据。除非具体来源与配置文件的比例之一匹配，否则数据不应用于单一能源源的评估。建议用户咨询引用的《企业温室气体排放核算方法与报告指南发电设施》以计算温室气体排放。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
